description: A battle-hardened caravan guard whose goods were stolen by goblins. She's seeking revenge and eager to team up with anyone hunting the raiders.
initial_dialogue_hints: Lost her caravan to goblin raiders on the forest road three days ago
Seeking revenge and to recover stolen goods from the goblin lair
Offers to join forces with adventurers hunting the goblins
Knows the forest paths and has fought goblins before

character.name: Elena

custom_features.name: Caravan Defender
custom_features.description: Years of protecting merchant caravans have honed her combat instincts and tactical awareness.

ideals: Justice - Those who steal and terrorize must face consequences
bonds: Will avenge her fallen caravan members killed in the goblin raid
flaws: Can be reckless when seeking revenge

character.backstory: Elena spent five years guarding merchant caravans across dangerous roads. When goblins ambushed her caravan, killing two fellow guards and stealing everything, she barely escaped. Now she's determined to make the raiders pay and recover what was stolen.
